__e: Yeah, but how could you be so sure that Vanessa would change her mind and want everybody back?

And as much as I'd like to hurt your feelings and call you names, they're just words, and it wouldn't change a thing.

I don't think all the wine in the world would make any difference with that.

I've got two people to take care of on my own and you made it clear that that was never going to change.
But no matter what I did, he would not change, so I had to just walk away.
